name: Merge Cars City Evolution
description:
Merge Cars City - Idle Evolution Clicker
Lets you take into the extreme gameplay of modern addictive and contemporary games that comes with full package to take care of all your casual gaming needs. Presenting you with our new addictive clicker game in our categories of the merge and clicker games that brings you with a unique experience of keeping and maintaining varieties of cars and motor vehicles.

Merge Car is combination of merge and idle game. Unlock new cars, merge them to upgrade and earn more money.

Merge Cars Feature :
- Easy, addictive and very challenging
- More than 40+ kinds of cars style isometric.
- Merge cars to upgrade and racing to earn money.
-Variety of cars. There are more than 40 kinds of cars in the game. And some rare cars are waiting for you to collect.
- Idle system. Your cars racing automatically. You can get money even when you are offline.
- Simple, intuitive and easy to use controls
- Simple, intuitive and instinctive graphics and gameplay
- Enlarge your car collection by unlocking them
- Upgrade them to have fantastic cars in the town
- Earn more many

play and discover. We have also got some unique colors including yellow , blue and colorful vintage cars to get you excited. Play, merge , discover and learn.

If you are stuck in traffic, standing in lift, walking in garden, free in office or unable to sleep, this is the best leisure game activity you can have to pass your time in the most amazing and exciting way,
Just start the game and help merging and clicking your cars to get far as possible.

Make your cars team become the biggest one in the world!
